availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Baxter Bradford Stiles (Denver, Colorado, student, lawyer, and Supreme Court clerk)

body.p: Denver, Colorado, student, attorney, and Supreme Court clerk. Vermont native. Son of Asahel Stiles and Nancy Bradford. Married to Caroline J. Lane on August 1, 1854. Student in Orange County, Vermont, in 1850. Attorney in Chicago, Illinois, in 1860. Clerk of the Supreme Court of the United States of America in Denver, Colorado, in 1861.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Vermont, Orange County, Newbury, p. 102A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Illinois, Cook County, Chicago Ward 1, p. 212.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Colorado Territory, Arapahoe County, Denver, p. 14B.
Mary Stiles (Paul) Guild, The Stiles Family in America: Genealogies of the Massachusetts Family, Descendants of Robert Stiles of Rowley, Mass. 1659-1891. And the Dover, N. H., Family, Descendants of William stiles of Dover, N. H. 1702-1891 (: Albany, NY: Joel Munsellâ€™s Sons, 1892), p. 486-487.
